Landing.title: Charity CRM
Landing.description: CRM for automating the Fund's business processes. Our goal is to ensure transparency of actions. We strive to be open and honest about donations.

data.fDescription: A non-profit organization whose purpose is to raise funds for needs.
data.dDescription: People who have found themselves in one or another critical situation in life. They really need your help!
data.tDescription: We strive for a transparent money transfer process. Transactions are based on blockchain technology.
